Actions.Name: Dissonant Bolt
Effects: Foes in the line may be teleported 1.

CustomComponents.Name: Round 3+
CustomComponents.Description: Increase this teleport to 2 and deal 2 piercing damage again to foes teleported this way.

Actions.Name: Flash Step
Actions.Description: Teleport 1, then either Teleport 2, or deal 2 piercing damage to a foe in range 3.

Actions.Name: Crackling Rift
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a line 3 dangerous terrain effect in range 4. Allies are immune to damage from the effect and can teleport 1 if they end their turn in the area. Foes are vulnerable+ while in the area.
